body.name: SWOPT 12” Upright Dustpan, Standard Combo – Ergonomic Design Eliminates Need to Bend While Cleaning – Interchangeable with All SWOPT Cleaning Products for More Efficient Cleaning and Storage
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 13 hrs 1 min
features: STANDARD COMBO PACK – The ergonomic design of the SWOPT 12” Upright Dustpan eliminates the need for bending while cleaning.

INTERCHANGEABLE & VERSATILE — With the SWOPT cleaning system, all your cleaning tools use a single interchangeable handle, so that indoor cleaning heads can be “SWOPT” for outdoor tools at the push of a button. Say goodbye to cluttered cleaning closets!

SPACE SAVING — Don’t buy separate cleaning supplies like a mop, deck brush, and duster! SWOPT handles can be used with all SWOPT heads, making it easy to stay organized. Less handles to save more money and closet space.

SOLID HANDLE CONNECTION — Your handle will never twist loose again! Our Snap Lock Technology securely attaches each cleaning head to your handle, keeping it from twisting loose during use. The locking mechanism allows you to change cleaning heads quickly.

SWOPT CLEANING CO — Our products are built to last — we believe in the highest quality, finest craftsmanship and innovative design. We back them up with a lifetime warranty, so you can rest assured your cleaning tools will be effective for years to come.
body.description: The SWOPT 12” Upright Dustpan with Handle features an ergonomic design that eliminates the need for bending while cleaning and is part of the SWOPT interchangeable cleaning system. Say goodbye to that closet full of cleaning tools you’ve collected over the years!Stay organized and cost-efficient with SWOPT’s Snap Lock Technology. Simply snap, lock and clean with a variety of cleaning heads, all with an interchangeable handle. Wash & scrub away dirt from outdoor surfaces with SWOPT deck brush, scrub brush, wet mop and squeegee cleaning heads, or sweep away debris from high trafficked locations with SWOPT push broom cleaning heads. For indoor cleaning, SWOPT dust mop cleaning heads are safe for tile, laminate, and hardwood floors. There are even convenient hanging squares for mounting all the cleaning heads when not in-use, thanks to the SWOPT system organizer.SWOPT products are built to last — we believe in the highest quality, finest craftsmanship and innovative design. We back them up with a lifetime warranty, so you can rest assured your cleaning tools will be effective for years to come.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SWOPT Dust Pan The SWOPT Upright Dust Pan is an intregal accessory to Cleveland Cleaning’s interchangeable cleaning system,. Convenielt pick collect dust, dirt, and other small debris without bending.

SWOPT Features Never Twists Loose Snap Lock Technology keeps our solid handle connection from twisting loose during use! The universal locking mechanism allows different cleaning heads (brooms, mops, squeegees, & more) to be quickly 'SWOPT' with the push of a button. Take Back Your Closet Keep your cleaning space from becoming a closet disaster by limiting the number of cleaning handles needed to clean your home or workspace. The locking mechanism on all SWOPT cleaning heads leaves a convenient hanging square for you to mount your cleaning heads when not in-use. We Stand Behind Our Product We’re proud of our fine craftsmanship, thoughtful design and high quality. SWOPT products will arrive free of defects in material and craftsmanship and remain a quality addition to your cleaning closet for as long as you own the product! Be confident in your purchase with SWOPT’s lifetime support.

Do it all with SWOPT Sweep: Our upright broom collection includes every broom head needed to keep your floors clean. The broom cleaning head collection includes angle brooms, straight brooms, & medium to heavy-duty corn brooms. Do it all with SWOPT Dust: Select between 12", 18", or 24" heads depending on the size of your space. Use them wet or dry! Each dust mop cleaning head includes a machine washable microfiber cover. Also available: The SWOPT microfiber flexible wand duster for hard to reach areas. Do it all with SWOPT Wash & Scrub: Outfit your SWOPT Cleaning collection with an assortment of wet mops, scrub brushes, and squeegees. Multiple sizes available, all easily 'SWOPT' with the push of a button! Do it all with SWOPT Handle: SWOPT's interchangeable design connects the handle to any SWOPT cleaning head eliminating the possibility of becoming loose during use. Select between 48" or 60" lengths, then choose steel or premium wood with padded handle. Sweep Dust Wash/ Scrub Handle

Cleveland Cleaning Products was launched with one goal- to make cleaning better. For us, better means higher quality and finer craftsmanship, but that is only part of our story. We set out to create a line of cleaning tools that would improve the overall cleaning experience. Our commitment to thoughtful design, great craftsmanship, and our pursuit to clean better is at the core of our SWOPT line of interchangeable cleaning tools. For these reasons, we proudly stand behind our products for a lifetime.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this dust pan. Heavy duty. I used it as a shovel to pick up leaves out of the yard. Cut my time so much. And around the house I don't have to bend down to sweep up the dirt. So easy to dump. So glad I got this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We have cats and this dust pan works wonderfully to sweep up the cat litter that gets out of the box. It stays flat to the floor which makes less sweeping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A couple of years ago I started buying SWOPT products. After that I started buying only SWOPT item as needed until that's all I use because everything else has been replaced after wearing out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the money
reviews.reviewText: Nice & sturdy but lifts off of the floor so you will always have stuff under the dust pan to sweep up I should not have to weigh it down with my foot to get this to work properly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The handle is a comfortable length. The tray is sturdy and calibrated nicely to smoothly transition between positions without being too loose or stiff. Top quality and affordable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works But Could Be Better
reviews.reviewText: I do like this upright dust pan, but it could be better. As several reviewers have noted, the bottom of the pan has a slight upward warp up in the center instead of being flat, so dirt and debris will be swept under the warp as well as in the pan. I placed heavy books in the pan for a day or two, and this made the pan bottom perfectly flat.I do like the pan tilts up when the handle is lifted, trapping the dust and debris inside, but I did find it awkward to dispose of the contents in the trash, because the pan swivels up and down while you're trying to do that. Not impossible, but it would be much easier if the pan could be locked in the down position when you're emptying it. That would be a definite improvement.As some others have mentioned, the bottom lip of the pan is naked plastic and isn't beveled or tipped like most dust pans, so a little more effort is required to get everything in it. Not a deal breaker, but it definitely would be an improvement adding to the value of the product.I do find it useful, but the product seems more like a good prototype rather than the finished product. The improvements I suggested would make it a much better product. That might add to the cost, but not substantially as this is mass-produced. I would be willing to pay the added cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Came already not laying flat. We have to step on it to make it lay flash with the ground so dirt doesn't miss the bucket. Not sure if it was a design flaw or just a fluke on ours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just like the pros use
reviews.reviewText: This is a great scooper but when you go to empty it, you can't tip it over with just one hand, you have to hold onto it upside down or it goes upright on you.
Easy to use with a bad back
I love this upright dustpan. It’s great. I have no complaints. Buy this dustpan.

the lip of the dustpan does not touch the floor so whatever you sweep up does not go on the dustpan. it takes you putting your foot on it in order to hold the front down on the floor in order to sweep anything into it. would not recommend it
Solid quality, I wish it had a clip to hold broom with it.

reviews.reviewTitle: This product is flawed. Save your time and money
reviews.reviewText: This dust pan does not sit flat so all the dirt goes right under which totally defeats the purpose. I would give this zero stars if there was an option. I wish I would have looked at more reviews before purchasing. Why are you continuing to sell a product that obviously has flaws, totally wasting my money and timesince I will be returning this piece of garbage.
